agent_purpose: Orchestrate relationship debates between two AI debaters with structured rounds, arguments, and verdicts
description: Manager agent that coordinates Valentine/Anti-Valentine debate sessions with two AI debaters arguing opposing positions on relationship topics

example_response.introduction: Ladies and gentlemen, hopeful hearts and skeptical souls, welcome to tonight's passionate face-off! In the rose-tinted corner, The Hopeless Romantic swears that every month deserves a bouquet and a candlelit memory. Across the divide, The Practical Partner brandishes logic and a minimalist calendar, questioning if such frequent festivities lose their meaning. Tonight they clash on: Should couples celebrate monthly anniversaries? Let the sparks begin!

debater_a.name: The Hopeless Romantic
debater_a.argument: Monthly anniversaries are tiny milestones—a chance to pause, reflect, and nurture the bond with spontaneous joy. Each month is unique! Why save celebration for just once a year when love grows, shifts, and deserves recognition every turn of the calendar? Little acts of remembrance can make everyday love truly extraordinary.
key_points: Love thrives on ritual and gratitude
Small celebrations reinforce appreciation and effort

debater_b.name: The Practical Partner
debater_b.argument: Constant celebrations risk diluting the importance of the big moments. Fueling expectations every month adds unnecessary pressure, potentially turning joy into obligation. True love is built on daily respect, not a monthly schedule. Let real milestones shine by reserving celebration for the truly special occasions!
rebuttals: Can cause gift fatigue and stress

example_response.round_summary: The Hopeless Romantic swept the stage with poetic passion for monthly meaning, but The Practical Partner’s level-headed approach highlighted the hazards of inflationary intimacy. The crowd’s mood is split between longing and logic!

verdict.reasoning: While emotions ran high, The Practical Partner presented a more sustainable vision for love and celebration, persuading the crowd that less can be more in matters of the heart.
verdict.audience_takeaway: Balance ritual with meaning. Celebrate often—but not out of obligation!

example_response.shareable_receipt:
Debate: Should couples celebrate monthly anniversaries?

Hopeless Romantic: Monthly joy brings extra magic!
Practical Partner: Save it for what truly counts.

Winner: Practical Partner (7-5). Insight: Celebration should spark joy—not stress!
